short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login and enjoy discount coupons from stores within The Bazaar Network!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Bazaar Network Chrome extension allows Ecommerce professionals to receive exclusive discounts from any other store within the network.

The Chrome extension works in conjunction with the Shopify (and future additional Ecommerce platforms) application, which enters all store that have it downloaded in to The Bazaar Network. From here, all users create a profile, and discounts for their own store, which are then available to all other users.

The Bazaar Network is a mutually beneficial network that is designed to create benefits for the Ecommerce industry similar to what is found in traditional retail. Users have the extension to be notified while shopping what discounts are available to them, by seeing the icon light up blue when visiting a Bazaar Partnered store.
